alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Geneva, Houston, northwestern Jackson, northern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dothan to 9 miles south of Geneva. Movement was east at 15 mph. At 222 PM CDT, a weatherflow station in Malvern gusted to 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Dothan, Chipley, Hartford, Taylor, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Malvern, Rehobeth, Avon, Esto, Madrid, Gordon, Campbellton, Noma, Black, Memphis and Grangeburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
